[Home](../) &gt; [@lattice/signals](./) &gt; BatchOptions

## BatchOptions type

Options for customizing Batch behavior.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BatchOptions = {
    instrument?: (impl: <T>(fn: () => T) => T, instrumentation: InstrumentationContext, context: ServiceContext) => <T>(fn: () => T) => T;
};
```
**References:** [InstrumentationContext](../lattice/instrumentationcontext/)<!-- -->, [ServiceContext](../lattice/servicecontext/)

## Example

Adding instrumentation

```ts
const batchService = Batch({
  instrument(impl, instr, ctx) {
    return (fn) => {
      instr.emit({ type: 'batch:start', timestamp: Date.now(), data: {} });
      const result = impl(fn);
      instr.emit({ type: 'batch:end', timestamp: Date.now(), data: {} });
      return result;
    };
  },
});
```
